org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.common.fica
Class FiCaSchedulerApp

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.SchedulerApplication
      org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.common.fica.FiCaSchedulerApp

@InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
public class FiCaSchedulerApp
extends SchedulerApplication

Represents an Application from the viewpoint of the scheduler. Each running Application in the RM corresponds to one instance of this class.

Parameters:
priority - Target priority
Returns:
the number of times the application has been given an opportunity to schedule a task at the given priority since the last time it successfully did so.
